post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Visual Basic / SQL Programmer required. Must have minimum 4 years experience in building VB front ends for SQL, ADO RDO. Your experience should include SQL programming and tuning.

We are looking for a programmer to help us bring an industry specific product to market. This product will be distributed across Canada, Great Britain, Australia and New Zealand. You have experience in basic accounting, excellent communications skills and like to work as part of a team. Here is your chance to work in VB.net and SQL 2000.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
info@promeric.com
Promeric Technologies Inc.
4 Lansing Square Suite 205
Toronto ON M2J5A2
post.title: GTA-VB / SQL Programmer
